mapper.select: select ( (select count(*) from tbl_member_alarm ma where ma.member_id = #{memberId} and ma.alarm_status = 'unread') + (select count(*) from tbl_diary_alarm da join tbl_diary d on d.post_id = da.diary_id join tbl_post p on p.id = d.post_id where p.member_id = #{memberId} and da.alarm_status = 'unread') + (select count(*) from tbl_like_alarm la join tbl_like l on l.id = la.like_id join tbl_post p on p.id = l.post_id where p.member_id = #{memberId} and la.alarm_status = 'unread') + (select count(*) from tbl_payment_status_alarm psa join tbl_payment_status ps on ps.id = psa.payment_status_id where ps.member_id = #{memberId} and psa.alarm_status = 'unread') ) as unread_count

( select ma.id as id, null as foreignId, ma.alarm_status as readStatus, ma.created_datetime as createdDatetime, ma.updated_datetime as updatedDatetime from tbl_member_alarm ma where ma.member_id = #{memberId} ) union all ( select da.id as id, null as foreignId, da.alarm_status as readStatus, da.created_datetime as createdDatetime, da.updated_datetime as updatedDatetime from tbl_diary_alarm da join tbl_diary d on d.post_id = da.diary_id join tbl_post p on p.id = d.post_id where p.member_id = #{memberId} ) union all ( select la.id as id, null as foreignId, la.alarm_status as readStatus, la.created_datetime as createdDatetime, la.updated_datetime as updatedDatetime from tbl_like_alarm la join tbl_like l on l.id = la.like_id join tbl_post p on p.id = l.post_id where p.member_id = #{memberId} ) union all ( select psa.id as id, null as foreignId, psa.alarm_status as readStatus, psa.created_datetime as createdDatetime, psa.updated_datetime as updatedDatetime from tbl_payment_status_alarm psa join tbl_payment_status ps on ps.id = psa.payment_status_id where ps.member_id = #{memberId} ) order by createdDatetime desc

choose.when: update tbl_member_alarm set alarm_status = 'read', updated_datetime = now() where id = #{alarmId} and alarm_status = 'unread'
update tbl_diary_alarm set alarm_status = 'read', updated_datetime = now() where id = #{alarmId} and alarm_status = 'unread'
update tbl_like_alarm set alarm_status = 'read', updated_datetime = now() where id = #{alarmId} and alarm_status = 'unread'
update tbl_payment_status_alarm set alarm_status = 'read', updated_datetime = now() where id = #{alarmId} and alarm_status = 'unread'
choose.otherwise: update tbl_member_alarm set id = id where 1=0
